reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress elegant with amazing colors and appreciate its comfort, quality, and flattering design that accentuates curves. Customers consider the dress worth its price.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get this dress!
items.body: Dress fit beautifully. ordered an xl could have worn the large. Color was amazing and I will be ordering again in another color. I needed a versatile dress I could wear again and again. Ordered for a 50s theme bday party to wear with long gloves and a fascinator. Complements all night! Now I have an alternative cocktail dress to wear during the holidays too. Read more
items.author: Twlia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best product!
items.body: This dress was awesome. I loved the shapewear inside. I had no lines! It smoothed me out greatly. It was actually comfortable. There was a cut out in shapewear so you can use the bathroom. Genius! Highly recommended. I think if I ever need a fancy dress again, I will buy from this brand. So easy! Read more
items.author: Alison Hunt

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unflatering and sadly, it’s not wearable for me.
items.body: I was initially very excited about this dress, especially because it came with a built-in girdle, which I thought would offer a flattering fit. As someone who is short and curvy, I was hopeful that it would complement my shape. Unfortunately, I was disappointed when the dress arrived. While the design concept is great, the material is extremely thin and see-through, making it unflattering and revealing in all the wrong ways. It did not provide the coverage or support I expected, and it highlighted every imperfection rather than smoothing them out. Sadly, it’s not wearable for me. Read more
items.author: Ariana H.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall- great dress for wedding
items.body: This dress worked great for my bridesmaids dress after there was a mishap with my original dress at the tailors. The shapeware really sucks you in, but makes it a little difficult to go to the bathroom. I got a lot of compliments on the dress and the fabric was stretchy and comfortable. The only reason I give 4 stars is I got some of the photos back and in the sun, you can see the outlines of my legs so it was slightly see through. The size fit great and the style was exactly what I was hoping for. Read more
items.author: Callie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: Must Buy! I purchased for a formal wedding and the shapewear did it's job! It was a little hard to slip up since shapewear was under but good once it was fully on. Read more
items.author: Monica Cepeda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and elegant
items.body: Loved this dress! I was worried that i would feel restricted because of the shape wear but it was so elegant and comfortable! Definitely buying more from this brand! Read more
items.author: Coral

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very nice but big flaw
items.body: I really liked the compression wear. The dress fit great. I didn't like the string at the shoulders that control where the neckline sits, on or off shoulder Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Date night
items.body: Amazing sexy evening dress. The material is soft yet stretchy. The length goes to my ankles. The bold bright color is flattering in all lights. Read more
items.author: T A.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Bodycon Formal Sleeveless Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Bodycon Formal Sleeveless Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black, Champagne, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
